text:
About the project

It was my biggest project so far. I made it with 2 other people for the final exam in our programming school. Its a browser game where you manage your island, attack other islands (player islands as PVP) and do expeditions on your own island (PVE). Gather materials to build new buildings and upgrade them. In the github page readme section you can find the link to the backend repository. Also you can read more about the project in the Prezentacio or Dokumentacio folders. Sadly the documentation is only available in hungarian but you can check out the presentation in english - just download the files which end with 'angol'.

Techologies

C# - asp.net core, webapi, entity framework, signalR, JWT etc.React JS - rxjs, bootstrap, axios, moment etc.MySqlCapacitor

About the project:

This full-stack app was for a DEMO project. It's my first Next JS Typescript project. It wasn't easy to do as a first time typescript project but i managed to do it with patience and with lots of reading / watching tutorials.

Techologies:

Python - fastAPI, sevenIO sms, dialogflow responses etc.Next JS (react) - bootstrap, typescript, material UI.MySql

About the project:

Its an unfinished project from my friend and I. We made it during the summer of 2022 but never got the time to finish it. It think its one of the better looking webpages that i have done. Its modern and slick - kind of tinder looking with its colours. I was the one who made the frontend part and its around 70% done.

Techologies:

C# - webapi, entity framework, JWTHTML, CSS, JavaScriptMS SQL

About the project:

Its a basic oldschool looking blog. I made the frontend and my friend did the backend for it.

Techologies:

C# - webapi, entity framework, JWTHTML, CSS, JavaScriptMS SQL

About the project:

I made this website for an interview. It took me 5 days to make. It has 5 parts:

1. MySQL database: it saves the questions/answers to a random id generated for the user (its also saved to the localstorage so one user has the same id).

2. Backend APIs for the communication.

3. Backend LLM with langchain for receiving answer for the questions from a file (json files).

4. Webscrape tool, for getting data from a webpage and converting it to a json file.

5. Frontend react application where you can talk to the bot and also check the previous conversations with the admin page.

Its one of my biggest full-stack applications and i used firebase for deployment with ngrok.

Techologies:

Python - fastAPI, langchain, openai llm etc.React JSMySQL - xamppngrok, firebase

About the project:
